transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Société} as string,
		{Dépot} as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Code GTAC} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Valeur as string,
		{Quantité n-1} as string,
		{Valeur n-1} as string,
		{CP Dépôt} as string,
		Dummy as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'fname',
	wildcardPaths:['Ecoulement/Maillard/*.csv']) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Nom Agence (Code)} as string,
		{CP Agence} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
select1 filter(!isNull({Quantité})) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull derive(Year = split(Mois, "/")[2],
		Month = split(Mois, "/")[1]) ~> getYear
getYear derive(Yearmonth = concat(Year, Month)) ~> yearMonth
yearMonth filter(!isNull({Dépot})) ~> depotNotNull
organisation derive({Nom Agence (Code)} = trim({Nom Agence (Code)}, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim({HubSAPid}, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> notNull
notNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Agence (Code)},
		HubSAPid),
	{CP Agence} = max({CP Agence}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID)) ~> uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> outerleftOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qté facturée} = toDouble(qte_ecoulement),
		year = trim(year, " "),
		Article = trim(reference, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(year,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> sumQuantity
window1, typeCaste join(getYear@Year == typeCaste@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
Rename derive(year = toString(year),
		Article = toString(Article),
		{Code client} = toString({Code client})) ~> typeCaste
yearmonthSplit, typeCaste join(getYear@Year == typeCaste@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(typeCaste@year) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(ecart = runingQte-{Qté ventes directes},
		signe = iif(toDouble(runingQte)-toDouble({Qté ventes directes}) <=0 , 0, 1)) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
sumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
derivedColumn1, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(marque_file = iif(toInteger(BrandID)==1604, "saunier", "vaillant"),
		{Société} = upper({Société})) ~> marqueFile
marqueFile select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {Société},
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité},
		ca_ecoulement = Valeur,
		{Code postal} = {CP Dépôt},
		year = fullLeftUnion@Year,
		month = Month,
		yearmonth = Yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		marque_file
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
innerOrganisation derive(Yearmonth = replace(Yearmonth, " ", "")) ~> yearmonthSplit
yearmonthSplit window(over(Year,
		POSSAMid,
		{Référence}),
	asc(Mois, true),
	runingQte = sum({Quantité})) ~> window1
select2 select(mapColumn(
		{Société},
		{Dépot},
		Mois,
		{Code GTAC},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		{Quantité},
		Valeur,
		{Quantité n-1},
		{Valeur n-1},
		{CP Dépôt},
		fname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
MapDrifted2 select(mapColumn(
		{Société} = Societe,
		{Dépot} = Dept,
		Mois,
		{Code GTAC},
		{Référence} = Reference,
		{Désignation},
		{Quantité} = Qte,
		Valeur,
		{Quantité n-1},
		{Valeur n-1},
		{CP Dépôt},
		Dummy,
		fname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
ecoulement derive(Societe = toString(byName('SociÃ©tÃ©')),
		Dept = toString(byName('DÃ©pot')),
		Reference = toString(byName('RÃ©fÃ©rence')),
		Designation = toString(byName('DÃ©signation')),
		Qte = toShort(byName('QuantitÃ©'))) ~> MapDrifted2
enleverVentesDirectes window(over(getYear@Year,
		{Référence},
		POSSAMid),
	asc(Mois, true),
	signe_cumul = sum(signe)) ~> window2
window2 derive({Quantité} = iif( signe_cumul <1,0, iif (signe_cumul ==1 , toInteger(ecart), toInteger( {Quantité})   ) )) ~> derivedColumn1
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SaunierDuvalNicolas HERNANDEZ0100001999Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique0} as string,
		{SaunierDuvalNicolas HERNANDEZ0100001999Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique1} as string,
		SaunierDuval as string,
		{01000} as string,
		{01999} as string,
		{nicolas hernandez} as string,
		{Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique} as string,
		{01} as string,
		{1647-Rhône-Alpes Auvergne} as string,
		{16400092} as string,
		{nicolas julien} as string,
		{SD diffus} as string,
		{NICOLAS Julien} as string,
		{16566798} as string,
		Prop_14 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MAILLARDECOULPREPARED
outerleftOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound
